review: The product itself is really really good. I think anyone can use it with ease and ready to play out of the box. The setup is simple and don't forget the box comes already connected to your prime account.The biggest drawback for such a powerful device is the lack of Google Play Store...which is replaced by Amazon App Store. There is no way Amazon App store is going to be anything as big as Google's or Apple's so I don't really see the point of restricting customers  to Amazon only apps or app store!I hated the fact that Amazon decided no to ship the product with an HDMI cable!!!The price wise it's good value if you get it on sale and not the full price. if you-can-unlock it you could do a lot of great things with the device..like adding goolge play store!
